meanings.definition: Analyzed or interpreted in psychological terms.
meanings.sent1: The psychologized approach helped me understand my feelings better.
meanings.sent2: The therapist used a psychologized method to interpret my dreams.
meanings.sent3: She had a psychologized explanation for why I always choose the same type of movies.
meanings.sent4: His psychologized perspective on the situation shed new light on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The psychologized analysis of the character's behavior was eye-opening.

meanings.definition: To explain or understand something in psychological terms.
meanings.sent1: I psychologized his behavior to figure out his motives.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to psychologize people's actions to make sense of them.
meanings.sent3: The detective psychologized the suspect's alibi to find any inconsistencies.
meanings.sent4: He tends to psychologize every decision he makes, which can be exhausting.
meanings.sent5: Psychologizing the protagonist's choices added depth to the story.
